member.name: T:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard
member.summary: Assists in anonymously monitoring the system clipboard by detecting any copied/cut data and the type of data it is.

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of .

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.IContainer)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of .

member.name: T:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.ContentTypes
member.summary: Provides a list of the supported clipboard content types.

member.name: F:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.ContentTypes.Text
member.summary: Represents content.

member.name: F:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.ContentTypes.Image
member.summary: Represents content.

member.name: F:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.ContentTypes.Files
member.summary: Represents content as a of files.

member.name: F:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.ContentTypes.Other
member.summary: Represents any complex objects.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.MonitorClipboard
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the clipboard will be monitored once the application launches.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.ObserveLastEntry
member.summary: When set to true, the last cut/copied clipboard item will not be auto-picked once monitoring is enabled. However when set to false, the last cut/copied clipboard item will be auto-picked once monitoring is enabled.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.ObservableFormats
member.summary: Gets or sets the data formats that will be observed or monitored when cut/copy actions are triggered.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.Tag
member.summary: Gets or sets the object that contains programmer- supplied data associated with the component.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.ClipboardText
member.summary: Gets the currently cut/copied clipboard text.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.ClipboardObject
member.summary: Gets the currently cut/copied clipboard . This is necessary when handling complex content copied to the clipboard.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.ClipboardFile
member.summary: Gets the currently cut/copied clipboard file-path.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.ClipboardFiles
member.summary: Gets the currently cut/copied clipboard file-paths.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.ClipboardImage
member.summary: Gets the currently cut/copied clipboard image.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.HandleCaption
member.summary: Lets you change the invisible clipboard-window-handle's title that is designed to receive broadcasted clipboard messages. This is however unnecessary for normal users but may be essential if you're working under special circumstances that require supervision. The window will however remain hidden from all users.

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.ForegroundWindowHandle
member.summary: Gets the current foreground window's handle.

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.StartMonitoring
member.summary: Starts the clipboard-monitoring process and initializes the system clipboard-access handle.

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.StopMonitoring
member.summary: Ends the clipboard-monitoring process and shuts the system clipboard-access handle.

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.SetDefaults
member.summary: Apply library-default settings and launch code.

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.Invoke(System.Object,WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.ContentTypes,WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SourceApplication)
member.summary: Invokes the event with formal parameters.

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.GetForegroundWindow
member.summary: Gets the foreground or currently active window handle.

member.name: E:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.ClipboardChanged
member.summary: This event is triggered whenever the system clipboard has been modified.

member.name: E:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.MonitorClipboardChanged
member.summary: Occurs whenever the clipboard-monitoring status has been changed.

member.name: E:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.ObservableFormatsChanged
member.summary: Occurs whenever the allowed observable formats have been changed.

member.name: E:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.ObserveLastEntryChanged
member.summary: Occurs whenever the 'ObserveLastEntry' property has been changed.

member.summary: Provides data for the event.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.ClipboardChangedEventArgs.Content
member.summary: Gets the currently copied clipboard content.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.ClipboardChangedEventArgs.ContentType
member.summary: Gets the currently copied clipboard content-type.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.ClipboardChangedEventArgs.SourceApplication
member.summary: Gets the application from where the clipboard's content were copied.

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.SharpClipboard.OnLoad(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This initiates a Timer that then begins the clipboard-monitoring service. The Timer will auto-shutdown once the service has started.

member.name: T:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.Views.ClipboardHandle
member.summary: This window acts as a handle to the clipboard-monitoring process and thus will be launched in the background once the component has started the monitoring service. However, it won't be visible to anyone even via the Task Manager.

member.name: M:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.Views.ClipboardHandle.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of .

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.Views.ClipboardHandle.Ready
member.summary: Checks if the handle is ready to monitor the system clipboard. It is used to provide a final value for use whenever the property 'ObserveLastEntry' is enabled.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.Views.ClipboardHandle.SharpClipboardInstance
member.summary: Gets or sets an active instance for use when managing the current clipboard handle.

member.name: P:WK.Libraries.SharpClipboardNS.Views.ClipboardHandle.CreateParams
member.summary: Modifications in this overriden method have been added to disable viewing of the handle- window in the Task Manager.

member.summary: This is the main clipboard detection method. Algorithmic customizations are most welcome.
